text: Simone Cavens, also known as Cupie Cavens, was an American silent film actress who appeared in three films, The Unseen Vengeance (1915), Mother's Busy Week (1915), and Dad's College Widow (1916) ==External links== * Category:American silent film actresses Category:Year of birth missing Category:Place of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Place of death missing Category:20th-century American actresses
title: Simone Cavens
